valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 14 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 15 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 964 moving rather quickly east, expected 100 miles west of Bailey 971 by midday tomorrow. New low expected FitzRoy 1000 by same time
